channel.title: math.CT updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.CT updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Partial actions of groups on monoidal categories
item.description: arXiv:2412.13123v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: In this work, we introduce the notion of a partial action of a group on a strict monoidal category. We propose, in the context of Monoidal categories, new constructions analogous to those existing for partial group actions over an algebra such as the globalization, the subalgebra of partial invariants, and the partial smash product.
item.dc:creator: Eliezer Batista, Felipe Lopes Castro, Mykola Khrypchenko

item.title: Center construction for group-crossed tensor categories
item.description: arXiv:2404.09972v2 Announce Type: replace-cross Abstract: We define the notion of the $(G,\Gamma)$-crossed center of a $(G,\Gamma)$-crossed tensor category in the sense of Natale. We show that the $(G, \Gamma)$-crossed center is a $(G \bowtie \Gamma, G \times \Gamma)$-braided tensor category. This construction generalizes the graded center construction for graded tensor categories and the equivariant center construction for tensor categories with group actions.
item.dc:creator: Mizuki Oikawa
